dct_title_s: British Columbia Kamloops sheet, geologically coloured; compiled and drawn by James McEvoy B.A.Sc.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by contours. At head of map "Geological Survey of Canada, George M. Dawson, C.M.G., L.L.D., F.R.S. & c. Director." "Sheet No. 12." "556" Includes "Explanatory Notes." On verso "556 British Columbia, sheet No. 12 (Kamloops sheet) Geology." 1 map: col.; 53 x 54 cm
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
